detectors.description:
Ethage.sendDividendMtx3(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Ethage.sol#230-234) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! address(uint160(receiver)).send(blockPriceMtx3[blockLevel]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Ethage.sol#231)
	- address(uint160(receiver)).transfer(blockPriceMtx3[blockLevel]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Ethage.sol#232)
detectors.markdown:

	Dangerous calls:
	- [! address(uint160(receiver)).send(blockPriceMtx3[blockLevel])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Ethage.sol#L231)
	- [address(uint160(receiver)).transfer(blockPriceMtx3[blockLevel])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Ethage.sol#L232)
